snippet: If radical leftists are swept into power next year, they might demand that international lenders write off some of the country's $400 billion debt.
lead_paragraph: If radical leftists are swept into power next year, they might demand that international lenders write off some of the country's $400 billion debt.

headline.print_headline: Next Hurdle for Greece's Economy: Its Own Political Uncertainty
headline.main: Next Hurdle for Greece's Economy: Its Own Political Uncertainty
